channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:40 Draw alarm to Zaporizhzhya region. Since further messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:40 Draw alarm to Zaporizhzhya region. Since further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
